message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it will be incredibly valuable to you, and I'm happy to answer any questions you might have.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
I understand your position, Bob, but the value of this product to you is undeniable. How about we meet in the middle at $12,500?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $11,000. How about we try $11,500? I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to stay within my budget.
